parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the column whose type to get

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden columns in Index, false to not

parameters.name: PropertyData
parameters.description: Property data specific to the type of column (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Return code as defined in swColumnTypeStatus_e

title: ITableAnnotation.GetColumnType3
description: Gets the type and property data for the specified BOM table column.
signature:
System.Int32 GetColumnType3( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
,
   out System.Object
PropertyData
,
   out System.Int32
Status
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the column whose type to get

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden columns in Index, false to not

parameters.name: PropertyData
parameters.description: Property data specific to the type of column (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Return code as defined in swColumnTypeStatus_e

returns: Type of column as defined in swTableColumnTypes_e
remarks:
PropertyData varies by the type of column. See the Remarks in
ITableAnnotation::SetColumnType3
.

examples.title: Get and Set BOM Column Types and Cell Equations (VBA)
